metadata.title: CVE-2023-36675 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.11, 1.36.x through 1.38.xbefore 1.38.7, and 1.39.x before 1.39.4. BlockLogFormatter.php inBlockLogFormatter allows XSS in the partial blocks feature.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
